mapper.select: SELECT a.gno, rdate, mno, cno, bno, uuid, fileName, fileType, path FROM TB_ATTACH_GROUP a LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ATTACH b ON a.GNO = b.GNO WHERE bno in(SELECT bno FROM tb_board START WITH bno=#{bno} CONNECT BY PRIOR bno = refno)

insert.foreach:
INTO TB_ATTACH_GROUP(gno, cno, mno, bno) VALUES(seq_attach_group.nextval, #{item.cno}, #{item.mno}, #{item.bno})
INTO TB_ATTACH(uuid, fileName, fileType, gno, path) VALUES(#{file.uuid}, #{file.fileName}, #{file.fileType}, seq_attach_group.nextval, #{file.path})
